morphInfos.tenseExplained: it happens (Aorist Imperative does not indicating any tense)
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something done to one
morphInfos.moodExplained: saying that an action should or must happen
morphInfos.personExplained: they are people or things being spoken or written about
morphInfos.numberExplained: there are two or more of them
morphInfos.explanation: an action that certainly is done to people or things being discussed
